resources.string: Unable to connect to Google Play Services. Please try again later or use Paypal instead. :-)
No contacts found that need a country code.
You need to select a country!
You need to select at least one contact to proceed.
You need to select a backup!
Donation could not be processed. Please try again!
Trying to contact the Google Play Services...
Can I select all my contacts at once?
What if I convert the number to the wrong country?
I found a problem with the app - what to do?
I like what you\'ve done - can I throw money at you?
An awesome app. More precisely, it\'s an app that converts all your non-internationally proofed numbers into numbers you can call from anywhere in the world.
Short answer - yes. Long answer - yes, either by longpressing a contact in the list and selecting \"Select All\", or by ticking the checkbox above the list itself.
Nothing at all. You just need to head over to the backup section (via the menu) and restore any contact that you may want to restore.

The best thing you can do is let me know. If it\'s a crash we\'re talking about, then make sure you send the report that Google asks of you to send. If it\'s something else, don\'t hesitate to get in touch with me. :-)

Yes! All the money goes straight into the development fund which basically means that I hopefully will be able to do even more things that you can use. However, I might have to bribe my girlfriend with a dinner every once in a while, ha.

...you can longpress whenever it\'s possible to select more than one row in a list? If you do that, you\'ll be able to select all rows with only one more tap.\n\nWorth noting is that you achieve the same effect by hitting the checkbox above the lists.

...it\'s possible to convert a phone number into a bit over 200 different countries? If you travel around a lot and store local numbers on your device, then this app will help you get back in touch when you\'ve crossed the border.
...you can suggest features that should be brought into the app? Just send a bunch of suggestions my way and I\'ll see what I can do!
The service has been disabled because you haven\'t selected a country in the settings!
